definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Electrophosresis in discontinuous buffer system was applied for the presenting patterns and fractions of the pancreatic amylase isoenzymes.
sentences.chinese: 应用不连续缓冲系统薄膜电泳法行酶谱分析。

sentences.english: A method was developed for determination of fipronil residue in leguminous vegetables with solid-phase extraction(SPE) combined with gas chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 建立氟虫腈在豆类蔬菜中的残留气相色谱分析方法。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the method of fingerprint analysis of Potentilla anserina by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立蕨麻药材HPLC指纹图谱分析方法。

sentences.english: An HPLC method for determination of cinnamaldehyde in cassia bark capsules was developed.
sentences.chinese: 报道了桂皮胶囊中桂皮醛的高效液相色谱分析方法。

sentences.english: A new method based on bispectral analysis for rotating machinery faults diagnosis is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于双谱分析的旋转机械故障诊断新方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, the application of ferrograph analysis technology in Shendong Colliery is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了铁谱分析技术在神东矿区的应用情况。

sentences.english: Electrophoresis in discontinuous buffer system was applied to fractionalize the pancreatic amylase isoenzymes.
sentences.chinese: 应用不连续缓冲系统薄膜电泳法行酶谱分析。

sentences.english: Gas chromatography shows that there are more than 100 compounds in light hydrocarbon pyrolysates.
sentences.chinese: 经毛细色谱分析，热解轻烃中有100余种化合物。

sentences.english: With pedigree analysis, the genetic mode of the disease in the family are autosomal dominant inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 据系谱分析，该疾病符合常染色体显性遗传方式。

sentences.english: In-depth discussion of wavelet mother function is made by using spectrum analysis method.
sentences.chinese: 应用谱分析的方法，对小波母函数作了深入的探讨。

sentences.english: OPA (HPLC) was adopted to detect the contents of amino acids in hippocampus.
sentences.chinese: 采用OPA高效液相色谱分析法检测海马氨基酸含量。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo establish a fingerprint analysis of Origanum vulgare L…
sentences.chinese: 目的建立牛至挥发油的指纹图谱分析方法。

sentences.english: The lung sound feature were extracted by using higher-order spectral technique.
sentences.chinese: 用高阶谱分析方法，对肺音信号进行了特征提取。

sentences.english: Therefore, the laser allows a reduction in the number of lasers in a spectroscopic analysis system.
sentences.chinese: 由此，光谱分析系统中的激光器数量将得以减少。

sentences.english: SBPV data were analyzed by periodogram.
sentences.chinese: 使用周期图法对SBPV进行谱分析。

sentences.english: Principles and applications of modern near infrared spectroscopic techniques.
sentences.chinese: 现代近红外光谱分析技术的原理及应用。

definition: components/individual parts making up a compound
